lead_paragraph: California's budget watchdog on Thursday gave its blessing to Los Angeles' bid to host the 2024 Olympic games, saying its a "low-cost, low-risk" approach will not require building major new venues and will not subject the state to excessive financial risk.

headline.print_headline: California Budget Watchdog Boosts Los Angeles Olympic Bid
headline.main: California Budget Watchdog Boosts Los Angeles Olympic Bid
